CustomField.description: This is used when there is a failure on a specific PMDSOR prepared/callout URL and you want to run only that URL
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Example Custom Query (to be used without the "quotes"): SalesItems -> "?$expand=MainAttributes&$orderby=NSNCode&$skip=105600&$top=100" PCI -> "?$expand=MainAttributes(%24filter%3DName%20eq%20\'NSN%20Finance%20Reporting%20Structure\')%2CRelationInfo(%24filter%3DRelType%20eq%20\'EBOM\'%20or%20RelType%20eq%20\'Classified%20item\')&$orderby=NSNCode&$skip=600&$top=10"
CustomField.label: Custom Query
